people that the nation's treasures are safe. "I am the only source of continuing truth concerning antiquities, and these rumors are aimed at making the Egyptian people look bad," Zahi Hawass wrote. If anything happens to the museum, I would bravely tell everyone all over the world because I am a man of honor, and I would never hide anything from you. It is from my heart that I tell people everywhere that I am the guardian of these monuments that belong to the whole world.
